titleStmt.title: A cœlestiall planisphere by J. Seller.
titleStmt.author: Seller, John, fl. 1658-1698.

notesStmt.note: Leaf [4] has title: Zodiacus stellatus cujus limitibus planetarum omnium visibiles viæ comprehenduntur.
